titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to "Notes relative to the original construction and the reconstruction of Chief Sonihat's 'Whale House,' New Kasaan, P.W.I."
Notes relative to the original construction and the reconstruction of Chief Sonihat's "Whale House," New Kasaan, P.W.I.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-03-12.

langusage.language: Finding aid is written in English.

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard), 2nd Edition.

did.unittitle: Notes relative to the original construction and the reconstruction of Chief Sonihat's "Whale House" New Kasaan, P.W.I.
did.abstract: Manuscript notes, November 22, 1938, regarding the conservation of a piece of Haida Indian architecture in New Kasaan, Prince of Wales Island, Alaska. The original Whale House in New Kasaan collapsed in the 1920s.

bioghist.p: The original Whale House in New Kasaan collapsed in the 1920s. Linn A. Forrest was part of the effort to replace the building, as part of the work of the Civilian Conservation Corps, while remaining true to the original Whale House as much as possible.

prefercite.p: Notes Relative to the Original Construction and the Reconstruction of Chief Sonihat's "Whale House" New Kasaan, P.W.I., Mss 1099, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

scopecontent.p: Manuscript notes, 10 pages, November 22, 1938, entitled: "Notes Relative to the Original Construction and the Reconstruction of Chief Sonihat's 'Whale House' New Kasaan, P[rince of] W[ales]I[sland, Alaska]" regarding the conservation of a piece of Haida Indian architecture in New Kasaan, Price of Wales Island, Alaska.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society owns the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use may require seeking additional authorization from copyright owners.
